item.title: Prime Bank re-elects Tanjil Chowdhury as Chairman
item.description: The Board of Directors of Prime Bank PLC., in its 585th meeting, has re-elected Tanjil Chowdhury as Chairman of the bank. Chowdhury first assumed the role of Chairman in 2020 and has since led Prime Bank through a transformative period of growth and innovation, according to a media release.
